summary: This document is an email chain from October 15, 2019, regarding the preparation of a subpoena for Bank of America. The subpoena is related to tracing transfers from the Butterfly Trust, which an FBI forensic accountant is analyzing. The email shows coordination between FBI personnel to obtain financial records.

events.title: Subpoena Request for Bank of America
events.description: An FBI forensic accountant requests a subpoena for Bank of America records to trace transfers from the Butterfly Trust, which is central to his analysis.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively investigating financial transfers linked to the Butterfly Trust as of October 2019.
A forensic accountant identified a Bank of America account as the endpoint for Butterfly Trust transfers.
The FBI was preparing a subpoena to obtain records from Bank of America to complete financial analysis.
